attributes.action: Conduct a retrospective assessment of interference with the EU referendum
attributes.additional_details:
Conducting this assessment would let us know if there has been a problem and what we could and should do to remedy it, or reassure the public that the UK's democratic processes are safe and secure.

Para 47 of the ISC report on Russia (http://isc.independent.gov.uk/committee-reports) calls for the assessment and summary.
attributes.background: Follow the Intelligence and Security Committee's recommendation that the UK Intelligence Community should produce an assessment of potential Russian interference in the EU referendum, and publish an unclassified summary of it.
